text: Dolf de Vries (11 July 1937 â€“ 5 December 2020) was a Dutch actor and writer. He was born in The Hague. He was known for his roles as Paul in Turkish Delight (1973), Jacques in Soldier of Orange (1977), Dr. de Vries in The Fourth Man (1983) and as Mr. Smaal in Black Book (2006). de Vries died on 5 December 2020 in The Hague at the age of 83.Soldaat van Oranje-acteur Dolf de Vries (83) overleden ==References== Category:1937 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Dutch movie actors Category:Dutch television actors Category:Dutch stage actors Category:Dutch voice actors Category:Actors from The Hague Category:Writers from The Hague
title: Dolf de Vries
